title: Moderna CEO says private investors funded COVID vaccine—not billions from gov’t
description: Bancel claimed billions in federal funding merely accelerated development.

title: Google’s PaLM-E is a generalist robot brain that takes commands
description: ChatGPT-style AI model adds vision to guide a robot without special training.

title: These juvenile snapping shrimp have the fastest claws in the sea
description: They can snap their claws at accelerations on par with a bullet shot from a gun.

title: Adorable Playdate handheld gets new free games alongside $20 price increase
description: Interested customers have until April 7 to lock in current $179 price.

title: Musk suspends “overzealous” rightsholders for “weaponizing” DMCA on Twitter
description: Musk considers "egregious, repeated" takedown notices "a plague on humanity.”

title: Biden FCC nominee withdraws, blaming cable lobby and “unlimited dark money“
description: Gigi Sohn gives up amid opposition from Republicans and Democrat Joe Manchin.

title: Even Hubble’s seeing a growing number of satellite tracks
description: An analysis of past Hubble images shows an increasing number of satellite tracks.

title: Biden helped draft bipartisan bill that could ban TikTok nationwide
description: A dozen senators support giving US Commerce secretary power to ban TikTok.

title: Hospital’s water purification system stripped out chlorine, killing 3 patients
description: It was supposed to improve taste, but instead led to deadly infections.

title: Dealmaster: Eufy’s smartest door lock is now on sale
description: We've got smart cameras, locks, and doorbells to secure your home.

title: After Musk’s mass layoffs, one engineer’s mistake “broke the Twitter API”
description: Twitter's paid-API project had "only one site reliability engineer," report says.

title: YouTube is killing the overlay ad format next month
description: Annoying banner ads that cover videos are getting the boot.

title: Microsoft makes Outlook for Mac free, no Office or Microsoft 365 required
description: Mac Outlook is still a different app from the Windows version, but not forever.

title: Why the floppy disk just won’t die
description: A surprising number of industries, from embroidery to aviation, still use floppies.

title: After nearly a decade in development, Japan’s new rocket fails in debut
description: Japan's science minister said the failure was "extremely regrettable."

title: Sonos replaces the Sonos One with new Era 300 and 100 speakers
description: Plus: Sonos' Trueplay (sort of) comes to Android.

title: Threat actors are using advanced malware to backdoor business-grade routers
description: Hiatus hacking campaign has infected roughly 100 Draytek routers.

title: Dealmaster: Microsoft’s Surface laptops and tablets are on sale today
description: Laptops and tablet-PCs that span a range of use cases are on sale from Microsoft.
